bibl.title: Greek Manuscripts of the Ancient World. Second Edition Revised and Enlarged.

series.title: University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No.

bibl.seg: Turner Eric G. and Peter J. Parsons (Ed.), Greek Manuscripts of the Ancient World. Second Edition Revised and Enlarged. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 46.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1987, 4°, xvi-174 pp., front., 97 figg.

C.R. par Giacomo Bona, RivFil 116 (1988) p. 256. - Fritz Bornmann, A&R N.S., 33 (1988) pp. 109-110. - Patrice Cauderlier, REG 101 (1988) pp. 543-544. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 68 (1988) pp. 254-255. - Tiziano Dorandi, Prometheus 13 (1987) pp. 190-192. - N.G. Wilson, CR N.S., 38 (1988) p. 452. - Jean Irigoin, RPhil 3e s., 62 (1988) pp. 316-318. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 64 (1989) Nos 127-128, pp. 337-338. - S.R. Slings, Mnemosyne 4e s., 43 (1990) pp. 187-194 (concerne aussi Guglielmo Cavallo and Herwig Haehler, Greek Bookhands of the Early Byzantine Period, London, 1987). - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 58 (1989) pp. 426-427. - J.A. Berenguer, Emerita 58 (1990) p. 365. - Aires Augusto Nascimento, Euphrosyne 17 (1989) pp. 390-391. - J. David Thomas, JEA 76 (1990) pp. 250-251. - Kurt Treu, Klio 72 (1990) pp. 614-616 (concerne aussi Guglielmo Cavallo-Herwig Maehler, Greek Bookhands in the Early Byzantine Period, London, 1987).
